Module progettofinale.sailingclub
Package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller

Class PaymentController

java.lang.Object
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.PaymentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PaymentController extends Controller implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The class PaymentController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Payment fxml file. This class inherit from Controller class.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - It is the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object or null if the location is unknown.
      resourceBundle - It is the resources used to locate the root object or null if the root object has not been located.

    • handleReturn

      public void handleReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used by the button called "Return" to change scene and return to the member dashboard.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • handlePayCard

      protected void handlePayCard(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used in the GUI, specifically by the button called "PAY NOW" in the payment.fxml file to get the Cardholder, Card Number, month, year and CVV do some checks and then call the payment method.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • handlePayWTR

      protected void handlePayWTR(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used in the GUI, specifically by the button called "SEND NOW" in the payment.fxml file to get the Bank Transfer Identification Code do some checks and then call the payment method.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • payment

      public void payment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to make all payment requests (storage fee, membership fee and subscribe fee) to the server and finally manage the responses with GUI elements alerts or scene changes.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
